Crimes.Legal_Issue: Does s. 64(2) of IRPA apply if the conviction and sentence are under appeal?
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA) s. 64(2)
Crimes.Application_Facts: Ms. Nabiloo was sentenced to over two years for drug offenses and appealed; the IAD dismissed her appeal due to lack of jurisdiction.
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Appeal to IAD against deportation order
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Convicted of drug possession with sentence exceeding two years
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Challenge to IAD's jurisdiction under s. 64(2) during criminal appeal
Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Length of imposed sentence regardless of appeal status
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Jurisdiction of IAD when criminal appeal is pending
Crimes.Application_Basis: Sentence imposed exceeds two years imprisonment
Crimes.Relief_Sought: Stay of deportation and reinstatement of appeal rights
Crimes.Governing_Rule: 'Punished' refers to the sentence imposed, not actual incarceration or appeal outcome
Crimes.Harm_Assessment: Risk of deportation due to serious criminality
Crimes.Cause_Description: Drug convictions leading to deportation proceedings
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Reliance on final criminal court judgment despite appeal
Crimes.Residency_Compliance: Subject to removal due to inadmissibility
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Issue: IAD lacks jurisdiction if s. 64(2) applies
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Conviction and sentence deemed valid for IRPA purposes
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Sentence length triggers serious criminality regardless of appeal
Crimes.Decision_Making_Body: IAD and Federal Court on judicial review

Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Issue: Whether ongoing criminal appeal affects IAD jurisdiction
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: IAD dismissal upheld on judicial review
Crimes.Procedural_Requirement: Compliance with statutory bars to appeal under IRPA
Crimes.Risk_Nexus: Public safety risk due to serious criminality
Crimes.Basis_for_Decision: Sentence imposed meets threshold under s. 64(2)
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Issues: Right to appeal before IAD despite criminal appeal
Crimes.Basis_for_Inadmissibility: Conviction for offense punishable by at least two years
Crimes.Risk_Assessment_Factors: Nature and severity of drug trafficking offense
Crimes.Accusation: Trafficking in controlled substances resulting in multi-year sentence
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Effect of criminal appeal on immigration appeal rights
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Applicability of s. 64(2) during criminal appeal
